name: Snow Jewel Connect
description:
Snow Jewel Connect is the Arcade and classic gem swap type game. Connect three or more jewels in a row to earn more points. This app is basically the similar game as jewel match 3 games.
Features,
***Props for you;
***Level recorded;
***Really Challenge;
***Colorful jewels are here for you;
***Cool sound;
***Cool action;
